ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_Neriak] Raw deal - need help!
ygData.msgSnippet: ... OK PEOPLE! ENOUGH ABOUT IT ALREADY! The newsgroup moderators already have extremely large chunks of my behind about the multiple crosspostings, so let it
ygData.messageBody:
>From: Kelly Pruett <pruett@...>
>
>Kale,
>If you have a problem do the following:
>
>1. Call Verant and resolve it by phone.
>2. Don't cross post your bitching to nearly 10 special interest game
>groups.
>3. If no solution repeat from step 1.
>
>I think the members of many of those groups, including people like me who
>are on
>more than one of them would be very appreciative.
>
>-Kelly Pruett

OK PEOPLE! ENOUGH ABOUT IT ALREADY! The newsgroup moderators already have
extremely large chunks of my behind about the multiple crosspostings, so let
it be! I was only asking for some help, and will admit that I let my
emotions get the better of me (hence my whining). LET IT DROP! You're just
adding to the "spam" that no one wanted to and/or wants to see here.

To all those whom I offended, I apologize. I cross posted hoping that
someone could help me out. Instead, I started a major flame war. All I can
say..... LET IT BE! IT'S OVER! NOW DROP IT WILL YOU?!?!

That's the last public crosspost of an extremely off topic subject that I'll
post. Now I'll take my own advice, get off the soapbox I'm on, and drop it
leaving the matter be (IE - the last time I'll bring it up or crosspost; I
promise).
